messages.message:
yes, the next iteration of this feature would be to generalize over a set of multiple samples as you've suggested.
for the current iteration there has been some effort to avoid the overfitting. please do report cases you see this though

I think in my experience, oversimplification was as common as overfitting - I have seen instances where the generated prompt would be a simple field name with no description and the immediately captured data from that is the wrong information from the doc. This happened more commonly with dates, since it can be hard to distinguish between the correct dates and wrong ones. 

I was wondering if it’d be possible to do something like “this, not that” where you can also select what you don’t want to get from the document? Doing this across multiple samples could be helpful
@david.lee can you share some example docs where this happened please?
Yeah I’ll gather some examples and share
